Query.Sentence: SELECT #COLUMNS#, COUNT(CC.COLLABORATOR_CONCERT_ID) AS COLLABORATORS FROM ${mainschema}.CONCERTS C LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.VIEWERS V ON C.CONCERT_ID = V.CONCERT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.PLACES P ON C.PLACE_ID = P.PLACE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.ARTISTS A ON C.ARTIST_ID = A.ARTIST_ID left outer join ${mainschema}.COLLABORATORS_CONCERTS CC ON C.CONCERT_ID = CC.CONCERT_ID #WHERE# GROUP BY (C.CONCERT_ID, C.CONCERT_DATE, C.TYPE_ID, P.PLACE_NAME, P.CITY, V.COUNT_VIEWERS, A.ARTIST_NAME) ORDER BY V.COUNT_VIEWERS, COLLABORATORS DESC
